segments.text: I really enjoyed that film ! What about you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So did I . At first , I thought it was going to be boring , but then it turned to be good .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What part of the film do you like best ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , the scene of the hero's struggle with enemies impressed me the most .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I loved it , too . To tell you the truth , I even dropped tears .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Actually , tears also came to my eyes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It has got this year's Oscar Award .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It deserves it . The film gave us a lot of inspiration .
segments.speaker: S2
